item.title: Errata: Functional Programming in R
item.description: Chapter 2 The Structure of a Recursive Function, page 32: “Here I am assuming that is an integer…” should be “Here I am assuming that n is an integer…”

item.title: Errata: Functional Data-Structures in R
item.description: One big regret I have about this book is that I didn’t implement the pattern matching code from Domain-Specific Languages in R before this book.
